metadata.title: Court awards life term to killer

content.article_body: SARGODHA, Oct 25 (APP): Additional Sessions Judge Bhera Muhammad Sajjad Qasim on Saturday, while deciding a murder case registered under FIR No. 225/24 under Section 302, awarded life term to the killer with a fine of Rs 5 lakh here. The convict, Adnan Sikandar, a resident of Miami, had killed one Waheed Ahmed on a domestic disputes in 2024. The court awarded life term after finding solid evidence against the convict.
